localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Just as the Trello board revolutionized team collaboration by making it visual, simple, and fun for anyone, Trello’s new views are taking teamwork to places never seen before.
blogPost.body: Just as the Trello board revolutionized team collaboration by making it visual, simple, and fun for anyone, Trello’s new views are taking teamwork to places never seen before.
blogPost.title: The New Trello - Going beyond the board
blogPost.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: 正如Trello板通过使其可视化、简单化和对任何人来说都很有趣而彻底改变了团队协作，Trello的新视图正在将团队协作带到前所未有的地方。
正如Trello板通過使其可視化、簡單化和對任何人來說都很有趣而徹底改變了團隊協作，Trello的新視圖正在將團隊協作帶到前所未有的地方。

previous.excerpt: Can't find the right words to start a conversation? We have used GPT-3 to generate dozens of thousands of Tinder openers and picked the best of them (according to our limited experience).
previous.title: +500 Openers for Tinder written by GPT-3 - GPT-3 generated thousands of openers & we picked the best

localize.description: 找不到合适的开场白？我们使用GPT-3生成了数万条Tinder开场白，并从中挑选出最好的开场白（根据我们有限的经验）。
localize.tagline: GPT-3产生了数以千计的打开器，我们挑选了最好的打开器。

localize.description: 找不到合適的開場白？我們使用GPT-3生成了數萬條Tinder開場白，並從中挑選出最好的開場白（根據我們有限的經驗）。
localize.tagline: GPT-3產生了數以千計的打開器，我們挑選了最好的打開器。

next.excerpt: GPU.LAND offers GPU instances for Deep Learning — at dirt-cheap prices. How cheap? Up to 80% cheaper vs major cloud providers. We believe everyone, and not just "Big Tech", should be able to train AI models. So we built the cheapest place on the web to do it.
next.title: GPU.LAND - Affordable cloud GPUs for deep learning

localize.description: GPU.LAND为深度学习提供GPU实例--价格很便宜。有多便宜？与主要的云供应商相比，便宜了80%。我们相信每个人，而不仅仅是 "大科技"，都应该能够训练AI模型。因此，我们建立了网络上最便宜的地方来做这件事。
localize.tagline: 用于深度学习的平价云GPU

localize.description: GPU.LAND爲深度學習提供GPU實例--價格很便宜。有多便宜？與主要的雲供應商相比，便宜了80%。我們相信每個人，而不僅僅是 "大科技"，都應該能夠訓練AI模型。因此，我們建立了網絡上最便宜的地方來做這件事。
localize.tagline: 用於深度學習的平價雲GPU
